directions: Place the marshmallows and peanut butter in a saucepan over medium heat, and stir constantly until the marshmallows have melted and the mixture is smooth. Stir in the candy. Pour into a bowl, and let cool; eat slightly warm or cool.
ingredients: 1 (1.69 ounce) package candy-coated milk chocolate pieces
title: Marshmallow and Peanut Butter Dessert
